00062 class Parcelable {
00063   public:
00064     class Writer;
00065     class Creator;

00102     void writeToParcel(Parcel* dest, int32_t flags) const;

00107     template <class T, T> struct type_check;
00108 
00109     template <class T>
00110     static const char* getName(type_check<const char* (*)(), &T::PARCELABLE_NAME> *) {
00111         return T::PARCELABLE_NAME();
00112     }
00113 
00114     // SFINAE
00115     template <class T>
00116     static const char* getName(...) {
00117         return typeid(T).name();

00128 struct Parcelable::Writer {
00129     Writer();
00130     virtual void writeToParcel(Parcel* dest, int32_t flags) const = 0;
00131     virtual ~Writer();
00132 };
00133 
00134 template <class T>
00135 Parcelable::Parcelable(T* ptr, bool takeOwnership)
00136         : mpProxy(NULL) {
00137     if (ptr == NULL)
00138         return;
00139 
00140     struct WriterImpl : public Writer {
00141         WriterImpl(T* ptr, bool takeOwnership)
00142                 : mPtr(ptr),
00143                   mTakeOwnership(takeOwnership) {
00144         }
00145         virtual void writeToParcel(Parcel* dest, int32_t flags) const {
00146             mPtr->writeToParcel(dest, flags);
00147         }
00148         virtual ~WriterImpl() {
00149             if (mTakeOwnership)
00150                 delete mPtr;
00151         }
00152         T* mPtr;
00153         bool mTakeOwnership;
00154     };
00155     construct(getName<T>(0), new WriterImpl(ptr, takeOwnership));
00156 }
00157 
00158 struct Parcelable::Creator {
00159     Creator();
00160     virtual void* createFromParcelN(const Parcel& source) const = 0;
00161     virtual ~Creator();
00162 };
00163 
00164 template <class T>
00165 T* Parcelable::getN() const {
00166     struct CreatorImpl : public Creator {
00167         virtual void* createFromParcelN(const Parcel& source) const {
00168             return T::createFromParcelN(source);
00169         }
00170     };
00171     void* ret = getInner(getName<T>(0), CreatorImpl());
00172     return static_cast<T*>(ret);
00173 }
